task.prompt: Crea il file /etc/systemd/system/panda-dashboard.service con sudo tee. Il servizio deve: usare User=michele, WorkingDirectory=/home/michele/panda/dashboard, ExecStart=/usr/bin/python3 /home/michele/panda/dashboard/server.py, Restart=always, RestartSec=5, After=network.target. Poi esegui sudo systemctl daemon-reload

steps.command:
bash
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/panda-dashboard.service <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=Panda Dashboard Service
After=network.target

[Service]
User=michele
WorkingDirectory=/home/michele/panda/dashboard
ExecStart=/usr/bin/python3 /home/michele/panda/dashboard/server.py
Restart=always
RestartSec=5

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
